source: This translation is managed by the community and may contain a few errors. If you see any issues please contact us on discord! https://discord.gg/geneshift (or bencelot@geneshift.net)
target: Ez a fordítás a közösség által készült és tartalmazhat hibákat. Ha bármi kérdése van jelezze nekünk Discord-on!

source: You must complete a nearby challenge before attempting this.
target: Először teljesíts egy közelben lévő kihívást mielőtt ezt próbálnád.

source: Get the full game to unlock this challenge and gain more rewards!
target: Szerezd meg a teljes játékot hogy feloldd ezt a kihívást és kapj még több jutalmat!

source: 80% of the kill coins you earn are locked. Upgrade now to access all locked coins!
target: A gyilok érmék 80%-a le van kötve. Válts most hogy hozzáférj minden gyilok érméhez!

source: Complete this to get a reward!
You must unlock a nearby item before you can unlock this.
target: Először egy közeli tárgyat kell feloldani mielőtt ezt oldanád fel.

source: Not enough Kill Coins. Earn Kill Coins by leveling up and completing challenges.
target: Nem elég Gyilok Érme. Szerezz Érméket szintlépéssel és kihívások teljesítésével.

source: Not enough Kill Coins. Upgrade to the full game to access all your locked kill coins!
target: Nem elég Gyilok Érme. Válts a teljes játékra hogy hozzáférj a lezárolt érmékhez!

Play through the full campaign either solo or with up to 4 friends online.
Use 100% of the kill coins that you earn instead of just 20%. The locked 80% that you've already earned will become instantly available.
Complete challenges of increasing difficulty and gain bonus rewards. You'll also be able to complete one extra daily challenge per day.

Are you sure you want to change the texture that this map uses? If you have simply renamed your texture and are updating your map, then this is ok. Otherwise, the textures may not display on the tiles as you would expect.
Select the texture that this map that will use. If you want to use your own texture map, save it into
as a png. Note: your account name must be included somewhere in the filename for it to be usable and appear in this list.

If you choose to create your own texture map remember that each map tile is 64x64 pixels in size. Also ensure that the dimensions of your texture are one of the following sizes: 128, 256, 512, 1024, or 2048 pixels.

The winning player or team is the the first to reach the target kills and target cash set below.
The winning team is the first to extract all the objectives; one at a time and in the order specified below.
The winning team is the first to complete all of the laps in the direction set below.
To win you must detonate all of the bombs while surviving waves of zombie attacks.
The winning player or team is the first to capture all the Control Points in the map.
To win you must kill all the guards and then detonate the bombs that they are protecting.
The winning player or team is the first to reach the target score below, by being the last man standing.
These requirements will automatically be met by the starting conditions of the round. Set higher requirements for players to reach.
The classic deathmatch. Slaughter as many enemies as you can. The first player to kill

There are currently no objectives to extract. You need at least 1 objective before you can begin. Use the Objectives dropbox above to add some objectives.
Flags must be returned to the other flag in your base to be sucessfully extracted. The first team to extract all
Radios are unique as they constantly transmit their location on the minimap and encumber the person carrying them. They also cannot be returned by the opposite team. The first team to extract all
There is only one truck and both teams must fight to drive it to their respective extraction zones. The first team to extract all
Here you have multiple objectives to extract. Each objective must be extracted to its own extraction zone. The first team to extract all
Carrying the Battery through checkpoints increases the max hitpoints of the vehicle carrying it

Boosting is disabled when carrying the Battery
Cooperatively defend against zombies to detonate all the bombs in the map
The first team to detonate all of their bombs wins
zombie souls to detonate all of the bombs
Zombies will only spawn upon players within range of the bomb
Survive against zombies while detonating all of the bombs in the map. Players who are killed will turn into zombies
Players compete to finish quickly and place on leaderboards
Progress through the map by killing guards and detonating the bombs they protect
Hold [CTRL] to place and pickup chemicals.
Restores your mana and lets you cast skills.
Gives you cash. To buy weapons and ammo, stand inside a checkpoint and press [B].
Gives you skill points. Level skills by holding [ALT]. Skills reset after each match.
Increases how many phase shifts you can perform in a row. Press [SHIFT] to shift.

Lets you to create builds that mix Cybernetic, Physical, and Mental skills together. However, you will have to pay a penalty of 6 skill points to unlock each additional tree, leaving fewer points for actual skills.
Increases the XP you earn at the end of each match by 10%. This is added on top of the 50% bonus you get for unlocking the full game. This is applied to all forms of XP earned except challenges.
Knife an enemy while falling from the sky.
Kill an enemy by blowing up his vehicle.
Kill an enemy player with a grenade.
Knife 2 enemies while falling from the sky.
Kill a living player as a zombie.
Top the scoreboard at the end of an entire battle royale match.
Kill an enemy player while blinded by a Flash Bang.
Run over and kill an enemy player with a vehicle.
Win a solo round without harming any enemy players or zombies.
Destroy an enemy chemical with the Neutralizer chemical.
Kill 10 zombies in a single round.
Kill an enemy player by detonating a Torpedo. The player must be on-foot when killed.
Win a round without taking any damage.
Collect 10 cash piles in a single round.
Reach a 5x multiplier in a kill combo.
Obtain the maximum of 10 shifts without dying.
Win a 50 point, 10+ player solo match without a single death.
Kill an enemy player within 3 seconds of using a Warp Field.
Kill 2 enemies (zombies included) with the same Plasma Ball.
Have 10 chemicals placed in the map at the same time.
Spin a vehicle 360 degrees in the air.
Kill an enemy player by bouncing a bullet off a wall.
Use explosives to blast yourself 50m up into the air.
Kill an enemy player while dead.
Use Self Repair to heal back 100 of your hitpoints in a single life.
Buy enough skill points to reach level 30.
Win a 50 point, 10+ player match where you kill at least 2 enemies (or zombies) each round.
Kill 2 enemy players with the same bullet. Explosive and vehicle kills don't count.
While invisible, stay next to an enemy player for 25s. You must remain within 15m of the enemy the entire time.
Win a 50 point, 10+ player match in under 10 minutes.
Stay in the circle of death for at least 20 seconds without dying and without using vehicles.
Earn a total of $10,000 by dropping weapons into the Alchemic Acid chemical.
Kill 4 enemies (zombies included) with a shotgun. Do this in a single round while riding shotgun in a vehicle.
Kill 3 enemies (zombies included) by running them over with a vehicle in a single round.
Kill 5 zombies without dying and while being a zombie yourself.
Stay inside a buy zone for 90s without dying or leaving the circle.
Using the Barrett M98B, land 10 shots in a row without missing. This must be done in a single round without hitting vehicles.
As a zombie, kill the enemy player who most recently killed you.
Kill an enemy and survive with less than 20 hitpoints remaining.
Collect enough health kits to overheal to the maximum of 200 hitpoints.
Kill 3 enemies (zombies included) in the same kill combo.
Kill 2 enemies (zombies included) with the same Molotov Cocktail.
Destroy an enemy vehicle with your knife.
Destroy an enemy vehicle with the Spike Trap skill.
Fly 30 meters through the air in a vehicle.
Destroy 2 enemy vehicles with the same Bazooka.
Kill an enemy player with either the Bouncing Bullets or Return Fire skill.
As a zombie, kill an enemy player without using your claws or pests.
Kill the highest scoring enemy on the scoreboard.
Take a total 500 hitpoints of enemy damage without dying.
Kill an enemy player while they have double damage. Double Damage is given to players who are about to win the match.
Win a 50 point, 10+ player solo match with only knife or zombie claw kills.
Kill 2 enemies (zombies included) with a single cast of the Radiate skill.
Kill 2 enemy players with the same gun without reloading.
Deal 300 hitpoints of pistol damage against enemy players in a single round.
Kill 15 civilians in a single round.
Kill an enemy player by firing out the window of a car.
Kill 5 enemy players with a knife. You have the entire match to do this.
Drive a car for 60 seconds without crashing into anything and without taking your foot off the accelerator.
Buy something from every buy zone in the map in a single round.
Kill an enemy player with the final bullet in your magazine.
Kill an enemy player with a Plasma Ball.
Kill 3 enemy players with a sniper rifle in a single round.
Kill 3 enemy players with the Nailgun without dying.
Destroy 5 vehicles in a single round.
Place 3 Warp Fields inside 3 separate buy zones.
Destroy 3 civilian vehicles by ramming them with your car in an entire match.
Stay inside the central red zone for 90s without leaving or dying.
Use 10 different jump pads in a single round.
Kill a living player as a zombie by only using your claws.
Fire 500 rounds in a single life, without dying and not as a zombie.
Kill 10 enemy players using an AK47 or M4A1 in an entire match.

Your character will wear a plate of bronze shoulder armor and look brilliantly badass. This does not affect gameplay.
Your character will wear a plate of silver shoulder armor and look super sexy. This does not affect gameplay.
Your character will wear a plate of golden shoulder armor and look genuinely gorgeous. This does not affect gameplay.
Your character will wear two plates of ruby shoulder armor and look radically radiant. This does not affect gameplay.
Your character will wear two plates of diamond shoulder armor and look dashingly dangerous. This does not affect gameplay.
When you fall from the sky you will leave behind a pretty colorful trail of smoke.
Whenever you kill an enemy with your knife a booming HUMILIATION voice-over will play to everyone in the server.
Makes your knife glow in the dark, bright and colorful! Give your enemies something shiny to look at before you stab them in the gut.
This will reskin your knife to look like a baseball bat! Killing an enemy with the baseball bat will knock his head from his shoulders and send it flying off into the distance.
This will reskin your knife to look like a lightsaber! Killing an enemy with the lightsaber will emit a massive burst of energy and slice your opponent into itty bitty little pieces.
Unleash your inner Rambo with this sweet bandana! The bandana will trail behind you as you run around and has sexy cloth dynamics.
The cape is like the bandana but more badass. You'll look like a superhero as you jump down upon your unsuspecting victims.
Activates sexy neons lights underneath your vehicle. The neon lights are bright and colorful and really stand out when driving in dark areas.
Let's you change the color of your vehicle's headlights. Mix and match with your neons and make a sweet driving disco party!
Burn rubber with some sweet decals on your vehicle. Flames, flowers, stripes, you name it. The decals are painted onto your vehicle in a color of your choosing.
Change the color of your bullet trails! Your enemies will know they're in trouble when they see your uniquely colored bullets fly at them from across the map.
Increases the number of skill points you being each round with.
As a mercenary guards have no effect on missions. You must only target other mutants.
This mission requires teammates and does not work as a mercenary.
Creates a secret buy zone only you can use.
Used to capture Control Points. Capture points (biohazards) by placing a Capturer inside them. Before you're allowed to buy a Capturer your team must first earn a combined
Sells weapons for cash when they are dropped into it.
Teleports you to your other Warp Fields. Stand inside it, hold ALT, and click an arrow to teleport across the map.
Reveals enemies standing within your Sonar Cells.
Restores your health at a rate of
Restores your mana at a rate of
Destroys all enemy chemicals that you're standing within. You'll also be awarded

Protects your chemicals from enemy Neutralizers. Place this on a chemical and if an enemy tries to neutralize it, it will remove the Insulator but save the original chemical. Can only be used once per chemical.
Reveals the location of nearby enemy chemicals making them easier to neutralize. The revealing range is
This is visible to enemies when they stand inside it.
Does not work as a zombie.
Physical skills are tanky and aggressive, and work best with SMGs.
Mental skills are close-range and sneaky, and work best with shotguns.
Cybernetic skills are powerful at long range, and work best with rifles.
Investing points into a tree increases its level, which lets you unlock higher tier skills.
You can reset your build or buy extra skill points above. These points reset each game.
Used to unlock multiple skill trees.
Used to unlock multiple skill trees.
Used to unlock multiple skill trees.
Restores your health whenever you deal damage to enemies.
Heals you faster when out of combat.
Blocks enemy bullets. Upon expiry your Force Field explodes to damage nearby enemies.
You'll briefly deal less damage and drain mana over time.
Slows the speed of enemy bullets. Your bullets will also seek towards enemies.
Spawns blades that spin around you and damage enemies. After the blades turn red you can cast again to burst them for extra damage.
Shocks all enemy players and bullets in front of you. Shocked enemies will move slower. Any bullets you shock will freeze in mid-air.
Creates a large radioactive field on the ground that deals damage to enemies over time.
Fires a dart that poisons enemies, slowly damaging them over time.
Launches an explosive ball of plasma that gains damage the further it travels.
Increases your max health. Your max health will increase even more as you kill enemies.
You'll do less damage for longer.
Bounces bullets off your force field.
Reduces the damage of your force field explosion.
Slows the movement of nearby enemies.
Reveals nearby enemies when you stand still.
Allows your bullets to pierce through players and bounce off walls.
Slows the movement speed of all enemies within your radiation field.
Throws a line of spikes onto the ground when you cast Blade Fury. These spikes will damage all enemies and vehicles that cross them.
Splits your Plasma into multiple smaller balls, spreading the damage out in a straight line.
Plasma balls have a smaller size.
Throws a smoke bomb on the ground when you cast Black Hole, causing your enemies' screens to fade to black when they walk through it.
Reduces the strength of Black Hole's slow.
Steals enemy bullets and seeks them back towards your enemies. This triggers the moment Bullet Time is disabled.
Increases your ammo whenever you hit an enemy and have Frenzy active.
Teleports you to a targetted location after a short channelling time.
When you hit a shocked enemy they will emit sparks that damage nearby enemies.
Reduces the time that enemies stay shocked.
Fires lifestealing leeches that damage enemies and restore your health.
Leaves a trail on the ground where your poisoned enemies walk. Any other enemies who walk through this will become poisoned.
Your venom dart will seek slower.
Summons an orb that increases the damage of your bullets when they fly through it.
Makes your leeches bounce off walls.
Creates a clone of you that confuses enemies when you leave invisibility.
Leaves vapor where your Plasma explodes that causes enemies to slide uncontrollably.
Pretty awful as a car. But it's cheap and makes a nice step for jumping over walls.
Fast and agile - just watch out for the low health. If it catches on fire you'll burn.
Fast and durable - a great all-rounder. Can even withstand a direct shot from a Bazooka!
A good combat vehicle great for co-op drivebys. Press [F3] to hop into the back seat.
Has a radar the reveals the location of nearby enemies. Lets you see through walls and spy on your enemies' movements!
Very durable for its price and with 6 seats it's great for co-op drivebys.
Fastest car in the game! Press [SHIFT] to boost and Tokyo Drift all over the place.
Comes with a ticking time bomb. [Left click] to toggle the timer on and off, but make sure you hop out before it explodes!
A huge truck with massive health and 5 passenger seats. The back 3 seats allow for a full 360 degree shooting range.
[Left Click] to fire 2 homing missiles that deal huge damage against vehicles and zombies.
The Extraction Truck must be taken to its extraction zone to complete the mission.
Silent and deadly. The knife kills enemies in a single shot.
Kaboom! This will insta-kill if it explodes at your enemies feet.
Explodes with a huge flash of light that blinds nearby enemies for a few seconds. Minimise your own flash by taking cover as it explodes.
Fires a missile that deals huge damage against vehicles and zombies.
A silenced pistol with good accuracy.
High damage and rate of fire makes this a great sidearm - just watch out for the low ammo.
An extremely mobile superweapon that slows enemies.
A great run & gun weapon with the fastest movement speed in the game.
A high rof and high movement speed make this a great all-round weapon.
A high damage superweapon. Its bullets will bounce off walls and pierce through enemies.
Does huge damage at point blank range.
An auto-shotgun with huge close range DPS. Charge up close and blast your enemies away!

An extremely powerful superweapon that fires explosive bullets. You can lob these bullets over walls to attack unsuspecting victims. You can also blast yourself up into the air with its explosive force by aiming at your feet.
Very effective at range, but you'll need to burst fire to control its recoil.
Accurate and great at range. It's silenced so nearby guards won't hear you fire it.
An extremely accurate superweapon that fires seeking bullets. Locking on to an enemy will cause your bullets to seek towards them, dealing fast and deadly damage.
Has a huge clip size capable of non-stop suppressive fire.
Has a huge clip size with high damage, You'll move super slow though.
An extremely high damage superweapon that deals extra damage against zombies.
Gives you an extended scope to see further and snipe enemies off screen.
The classic sniper rifle. Fires extremely fast and accurate bullets and has a scope for increased view range.
An extremely long range superweapon that fires a beam of photons that penetrate enemy players and skills. Bullets actually gain damage the further they travel!
Tosses a flaming bottle that explodes on impact. These flames persist and deal damage to anything that travels through them.
Fires a flare that sets players and vehicles on fire, causing them to take damage over time and be revealed in the map.
An extremely deadly superweapon that shoots fire and ignites anything it touches.
Aww man, you got blood on my shirt.
Nearby allies support you by slowly regenerating your mana and health.
Hover here to view the skills menu.
click skills above to add them to the selected queue
You cannot queue skills unless you are playing in a Quickmatch.
Go to your spawn zone and press (B). If you run out of ammo you can rebuy your gun to get more.
Press (ENTER) to chat. Say 'wassup' to receive a bonus 50xp!
Kills increase your score by +1, and winning a round gives you +20. The first player to 50 wins.
Stand on a gun and press (E). Your ammo is shown at the bottom right.
Stand next to a car and press (E). Change seats with the (F-keys), and boost with Right Mouse.
Hold (ALT) and click 'Buy Skill Point' from the drop-down skills menu up the top of the screen.
Spend a skill point on 'Self Repair'. Your skills are temporary and will reset every match.
Cast Self Repair with Right Click. Your mana and skill hotkeys are shown down the bottom left.
This is the Outbreak game mode. To win you need to kill zombies, collect their souls and return them to the bomb. Try using skills with large splash damage.

After collecting souls you need to return them to the bomb. You'll gain score, cash, mana, hp and XP for every soul you return. Follow the arrow on your screen to take your souls to the bomb. Hold (TAB) to see your score.
Time to teleport! Press (B) to buy the 'Warp Field' chemical.
Hold (CTRL) to place the Warp Field on the ground. It's important to note that enemies can't see your chemicals after you've placed them.
Stand inside the warp, Hold (ALT), and click the arrow next to you. This teleport you to other warps!

This is the Conquest game mode where you need to capture all of the Control Points in the map. You do this with the 'Capturer' chemical. Wait for your team to get enough kills (shown by the green bar under the minimap) then buy a Capturer.
Control Points are the red biohazard symbols in the map. To capture one, hold (CTRL) and place your Capturer on top of it. Hold (TAB) to see scores.
This is the Extraction game mode. Follow the white arrow on your screen to capture your team's flag.
Follow the arrow and take the flag to the enemy flag near your spawn. Hold (TAB) to see your score.
This is the Checkpoint game mode. To win you need to pick up the Battery with a vehicle. Enter a vehicle, then follow the white arrow on your screen to pick up the Battery.
Follow the white arrow on your screen to drive the battery through each of the checkpoints. Hold (TAB) to see your score.
You can destroy enemy chemicals if you guess their location. Buy the 'Neutralizer' chemical and place it where you think an enemy chemical is hidden (hold CTRL).
You've completed the Newbie Checklist! Press (F10) to finish this tutorial. This opens the How to Play Guide if you want to learn more.
Be the last man standing to earn +20 points. Your score is shown under the minimap.
Stand inside a buy zone (shown as a yellow circle in the map), then press (B) to buy ammo.
After you complete a challenge, press (ESC) to claim it. Challenges award you items and XP, which you use to expand your buy menu.
Learn to play! Press (SHIFT) to Shift. Shifts are shown as blue triangles down the bottom of the screen.
Once you get a score of 50 you'll gain double damage. You then win one final round to win the game.
Select your knife with (3) and hold the mouse to charge it. Once you turn red you can kill in a single shot.
Learn to play and earn bonus XP!
Your score and the player count are shown under the minimap.
Your health, mana, cash, and shifts are shown here.
Press 1, 2, 3 to select weapons, and press F to select grenades.
Press C, Z & Right Click to cast skills. Skills require mana.
to toggle this guide on and off.

The meaning of life, the universe and everything you need to know about Geneshift can be found in this guide; so toggle this back on when you're ready to play like a pro. Until then you can press ENTER to chat with the server and ask questions. Have fun!
I JUST WANT TO STOP DYING!!
EARN A LITTLE EXTRA ON THE SIDE..
What do I have to do?
Follow the arrow on your screen to reach the next checkpoint. Try to earn combo kills to gain extra cash.
What if I miss some text?
Press (ENTER) to bring up the chat log. The green lines have important tips. Also when playing singleplayer you can hold (ALT) to pause the game and read the text at your own pace.
Stay out of combat briefly to heal yourself. Buy weapons (B) when standing inside a circular checkpoint. Finally, unlock healing skills (ALT) and cast them with Right Click, C and Z.
You gain +1 point per kill, and +20 points if you're the last man standing. When you reach enough points you'll gain double damage. The game will then end when you win your next round.
Avoid the circle of death and try to stay alive. If you become a zombie, use this time to loot for cash, and build a network of chemicals. Use Warp Fields to quickly teleport to the center buy zone.

When you view the skills page through the main menu you're looking at your permanent skill build. This build is only used in permanent multiplayer servers and persists between rounds. This build is not used in quickmatches or the campaign.
Here you can host multiplayer modes and play against bots. To play against humans it's usually better to join an official server.
You can improve your FPS by updating your graphics drivers. For now, would you like Geneshift to optimise your graphics settings?
No. The human eye can only see 30 FPS.
requires a manual download. Go to www.geneshift.net and get it now!
NEW VERSION: Click here to download
NEW VERSION REQUIRES MANUAL DOWNLOAD: Download
NEW VERSION: Please update Geneshift through the store.
